diagnosis.description: Diagnosis of breast tissues (M = malignant, B = benign)

radius_mean.description: Mean of distances from center to points on the perimeter

perimeter_mean.description: Mean size of the core tumor

smoothness_mean.description: Mean of local variation in radius lengths

concavity_mean.description: Mean of severity of concave portions of the contour

concave points_mean.description: Mean for number of concave portions of the contour

radius_se.description: Standard error for the mean of distances from center to points on the perimeter

texture_se.description: Standard error for standard deviation of gray-scale values

perimeter_se.description: Standard error for the mean size of the core tumor

area_se.description: Standard error for the mean area of the tumor

smoothness_se.description: Standard error for local variation in radius lengths

concavity_se.description: Standard error for severity of concave portions of the contour

concave points_se.description: Standard error for number of concave portions of the contour

fractal_dimension_se.description: Standard error for fractal dimension ("coastline approximation" - 1)

radius_worst.description: Worst or largest mean value for mean of distances from center to points on the perimeter

texture_worst.description: Worst or largest mean value for standard deviation of gray-scale values

perimeter_worst.description: Worst or largest mean value for mean size of the core tumor

area_worst.description: Worst or largest mean value for mean area of the tumor

smoothness_worst.description: Worst or largest mean value for local variation in radius lengths

compactness_worst.description: Worst or largest mean value for perimeter^2 / area - 1.0

concavity_worst.description: Worst or largest mean value for severity of concave portions of the contour

concave points_worst.description: Worst or largest mean value for number of concave portions of the contour

symmetry_worst.description: Worst or largest mean value for symmetry

fractal_dimension_worst.description: Worst or largest mean value for fractal dimension ("coastline approximation" - 1)
